entries.visitor_11: Heh, well, Jabba did always hire the fearless and inventive.  All right.  Here's all the cash I have on me.  Now can we go to the palace?
entries.visitor_10: Well, if you die out here Jabba won't hear anything about it, will he?
entries.visitor_9: Sorry, I'll escort you to the palace.
entries.visitor_7: What?!?  Is this a shakedown?  Do you know what Jabba will do when I tell him about this?
entries.visitor_6: How bout you make it worth my while?
entries.visitor_4: Yes.  Get me to the palace, and make sure nothing happens to me.
entries.visitor_3: I suppose you want my help now?
entries.visitor_2: Sounds like you're having a rough day.
entries.visitor_1: About time you showed up.  My bodyguard was killed by those sandpeople, then I had to dodge that imperial patrol.
